name: Mongke Tengri (Eternal Blue Sky)
shortLoreBlurb: Mongke Tengri (Eternal Blue Sky) is a deity from Mongolia/Turkic linked to supreme sky, order. Legends tie them to thunder, winds, and royal mandate.
description: Mongke Tengri (Eternal Blue Sky) is a deity from Mongolia/Turkic linked to supreme sky, order. Legends tie them to thunder, winds, and royal mandate.
